message.body: Can i stop by at 430 for the sax? Also, we're having a potluck an scifi movie night at my friends' on decatur st. You and Molly are welcome to come!
Hey if you want to swing by i will bring out the tenor. Just call. I'd love to invite you in but we're still sick. See ya
O yes! This is a new horn! Easier to play, soubds better and its tunable
Nice man! Cant wait to hear it.
